instructions: In a large skillet, saute chicken in oil until no longer pink; drain and set aside. Coat skillet with nonstick cooking spray. Saute mushrooms, green pepper, onion, celery, corn and garlic for 6-8 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Add salsa and reserved chicken; heat through. Serve over rice. Top with cheese and sour cream.
ingredients: 1 pound boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1/2 inch pieces
title: Salsa Chicken Skillet
